title: Specialist Art & Design Bookstores in Berlin
content:
Can anyone point me in the right direction?

 [‹ Type Design Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2843 "Go to previous forum topic") [archives/catalogue library and the media ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44939 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Conor

comments.content:
Thanks Ste.

Currently compiling these (à la uncontrollable spacing) at [bookstores](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052917/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/bookstores).

Nice! Yes, the default styles are a little wonky, no?

You need William Stout in San Francisco.

Conor, Stephen, I’ve mentioned the spacing to the powers as well. It seems like such a little nit-picky thing, but I feel the situation too.

Conor nice work so far!!
